title: Agent
content:
agent #  The Agent branch of volution concerns flat tiles that correspond to unique ways of existing/being. Each tile looks something like this..
If the agent, frame, and point form a record, then the structure and map make up the record player. Living as a human agent on Earth grounds us in music that can tile into a mosaic of selves to be explored and understood as a unitary self.
Tiles can be differentiated through two different transformations on the basic template above. The first transformation is of the record, and the second transformation is of the record player. Leaving the record player alone allows for variation to be encoded into agent and frame curves bounded by the map. Leaving the record alone allows for a variable number of map and structure edges. The first transformation favors computability and the second favors countability.

title: Cognition
content:
cognition #  Cognition explores what makes an agent tick. Like analog clocks, agents can target paths that connect inner fits to outter fits through actuation. The pendulum of a clock swings at an internal frequency which can be compared to an external frequency like the revolution of the earth around the sun.
Both the spotlight and holographic models of consciousness appear to have partial truth. The spotlight being associated with focused attention and the hologram with diffuse attention across a field. Agents can both peer into the narrowest scope and meditate upon the vastest horizons.
topology #  No cutting or gluing is allowed in topology. So topological distictions may be used to identify various tile states. Gluing together every layer of the record player produces a state called actuation. Fits glue maps to structures in the case of an external fit and frames to points in the case of internal fits.
actuator #  Actuation glues external and internal fits to the agent. This aligns with a state of flow. In the mist of an activity that is engaging yet smooth for you, it may feel as if time is flowing quickly. In volution, actuation or flow is considered a state where everything is connected topologically indicating an alignment between what the agent considers out and in.
fit #  Fits come in two flavors: in and out. Internal fits, or point-frame combinations, signify intuition, feeling, eureka, inspiration, depression, and so forth. External fits, or structure-map combinations, signify sensation, thought, experience, reward, punishment, and so forth. Another way to cut the distinction is through the dichotomy between denotation and connotation. As the outside can be labelled through finger pointing, though the inside can only be referenced in light while shadows hide roots below the surface.

title: Type
content:
type #  punctures #  Punctures are a vanishingly small perturbations of consciousness directed on one of eight paths. The four paths towards the agent combine with the four paths away from the agent to produce eight punctures.
externalize structure #  internalize structure #  externalize map #  internalize map #  externalize frame #  internalize frame #  externalize point #  internalize point #  mirrors #  Convergence and divergence of attention occurs as punctures accumulate towards or away from an agent. Mirrors occur between frames and maps, as well as between points and structures.

title: Ground
content: Ground #  The Ground branch is conscerned with agents on Earth. On Earth, agents are simultainously constrained and enabled by movement. Movement not just in space and time but along any path of discernible continuity.

title: Cause
content:
cause #  A cause is considered equivalent to a gap in the loop formed by joining cognize to coordinate in the array (cognize, continue, correlate, coordinate). Causation unites an internal fit with an external fit so that a linear map forms the ground of a structural tree growing bi-directionally. Each continuous unit of distance in the positive or negative directions can correlate with any other unit of continuity.
One useful measure being time, where the internal fit can approach the past by moving left and the future by moving right. The futher an agent moves in the past/future, the hazier the view becomes. Factorial explosions in the information required to remember can quickly overrun an agents ability to select a path.
